content.query:
SELECT 
    base_hero.filename() AS FileName,
    marvel_hero.[name], marvel_hero.superName, marvel_hero.[description],
    marvel_hero.aliases, marvel_hero.authors, marvel_hero.images,
    marvel_hero.partners, marvel_hero.powers, marvel_hero.ranking, marvel_hero.secretIdentities,
    marvel_hero.species, marvel_hero.teams, marvel_hero.urls
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'https://synapsedvdemo.blob.core.windows.net/synapsedvdemo/Data/marvel_search/**'
    ,FORMAT = 'CSV'
    ,FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ,ROWTERMINATOR = '0X0b'
    ,FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
) WITH (doc NVARCHAR(MAX)) AS base_hero
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(doc)
        WITH (
            aliases NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.aliases' AS JSON,
            authors NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.authors' AS JSON,
            description VARCHAR(256),
            images NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.images.thumbnail' AS JSON,
            name VARCHAR(256),
            partners NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.partners' AS JSON,
            powers NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.powers' AS JSON,
            ranking NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.ranking' AS JSON,
            secretIdentities NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.secretIdentities' AS JSON,
            species NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.species' AS JSON,
            superName VARCHAR(256),
            teams NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.teams' AS JSON,
            urls NVARCHAR(MAX) '$.urls' AS JSON
        ) AS marvel_hero 
/*         CROSS APPLY OPENJSON( marvel_marvel_hero.aliases )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_aliases
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.authors )

        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.partners )
            WITH (

            ) AS marvel_hero_partners
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.powers )
            WITH (
                value VARCHAR(256) '$'		
            ) AS marvel_hero_powers
        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.secretIdentities )
            WITH (

        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.species )
            WITH (

        CROSS APPLY OPENJSON ( marvel_marvel_hero.teams )
